The Doctors Association of Bangladesh (DAB), Dinajpur unit, organises a prayer session seeking eternal peace for the former prime minister and ex-BNP chairperson Khaleda Zia, followed by a discussion meeting on the upcoming national polls. The programme was held at the Zia Heart Foundation auditorium in Dinajpur on Friday, where BNP-nominated candidate for the Dinajpur-3 (Sadar) constituency, Syed Jahangir Alam, was present as the chief guest. - DAILY SUN PHOTO

M Najmul Islam (right) remains mired in controversy, from labeling Tamim Iqbal an ‘Indian agent’ to his recent outbursts against fellow board directors. Despite losing and regaining his post over insulting remarks against cricketers, Najmul continues to stoke the fire and the fury of the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) Vice President Faruque Ahmed (middle) in the BCB President’s Box yesterday suggests their patience has run out. Is this heated finger-pointing the inevitable fallout of the ongoing dispute? —TANVIN TAMIM
